item.title: A message from Guidance:
item.description: Students looking to make a course change MUST sign up for a meeting in the Guidance office. Last day for course changes is Monday, February 9th.

item.title: A message from Mr. Vonesch:
item.description: STA's annual "Shrove Tuesday Pancake Breakfast" is coming up in 2 weeks! If you need volunteer hours, or would just like to help make and serve pancakes, please see Mr. Vonesch at the chaplaincy office to sign up!

item.title: A message from Mme Perron and Mrs Kwok:
item.description: There will be a mandatory unity club meeting today at lunch at 10:40 in room 127 Mrs Zurawski's room please bring your lunch. All presenters MUST attend!!!

item.title: A message from Mme Perron:
item.description: All Europe Trip Students are reminded to bring in any remaining items for our Clothing and gently used items fundraiser as we will be dropping items off on Friday afternoon.
